name: NeurIPS Jailbreaking Competition
description: Challenge LLM safety by crafting adversarial prompts that bypass model defenses. This track uncovers real-world vulnerabilities and helps build more robust, trustworthy Al systems.

name: Kaggle Jigsaw Agile Community Rules Classification
description: Develop models that detect Reddit comments violating community rules.The challenge tests Al's ability to understand nuanced norms and enable scalable, consistent content moderation.

name: NeurIPS Social Deduction Track
description: Build Al agents for social deduction games, requiring reasoning under uncertainty, deception detection, teamwork, and strategic communication in multi-agent environments.

name: Kaggle - You Can't Please Them All
description: Create essays that expose weaknesses in LLM-based judging systems.The track tests the robustness of automated subjective evaluation and highlights inconsistencies across different Al judges.

name: Meta CRAG-MM Challenge 2025
description: Develop multimodal Al systems that use images and external knowledge,to answer user queries. The challenge evaluates visual understanding,retrieval, and grounded reasoning for real-world assistant tasks.
position: Rank 40 out of 500 + Poster Presentation in KDD
